comment: Theorem *5.18 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 124. This theorem says that logical equivalence is the same as negated "exclusive or". (Contributed by NM, 28-Jun-2002.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 20-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 15-Oct-2013.)
